title: Fighting Back
description: Rebecca didn’t do second chances, but apparently her heart didn’t get that memo.​The force of nature that was Rebecca Donovan was in a rut. Money was tight, her elusive sister was suddenly hounding her, and it had been far too long between dates. Becoming the victim of a sexual assault was the final straw that broke the vivacious and strong-willed florists proverbial back.Charlie Cole was floating through life on a wisp of uninspired air. Nothing could compare to the excitement and fulfilment that one night with Rebecca Donovan had brought him. A misunderstanding and stubborn stand-off saw that one night of heaven remains just that, one night.Little did Rebecca and Charlie know that from the depths of fear, with their lives thrown into turmoil, a fierce love would be born.Read Order:Saving EllaFighting BackTortured SoulMother's LoveLosing Lola
author: Kirsty Dallas
